events.name: React Native EU Conference
events.description: Join the largest React Native conference in Europe. Connect with developers, attend workshops, and learn about the latest trends in mobile development.

events.name: Jazz in the Park
events.description: An evening of smooth jazz under the stars. Bring a blanket and enjoy performances by local and international artists in the heart of Central Park.

events.name: Culinary Masterclass: Italian
events.description: Learn to make authentic pasta from scratch with Chef Giovanni. A hands-on experience suitable for beginners and food enthusiasts.

events.name: Global Tech Summit 2024
events.description: A deep dive into AI, Blockchain, and the future of software. Keynote speakers include industry leaders from Google, Microsoft, and OpenAI.

events.name: Mountain Hiking Adventure
events.description: Experience the breathtaking views of the Rockies. This guided hike covers 10 miles of scenic trails. Water and snacks provided.

events.name: Modern Art Exhibit Opening
events.description: Be the first to see the new collection 'Digital Dreams'. A fusion of traditional sculpture and projection mapping.

events.name: Marathon for Charity
events.description: Run for a cause! All proceeds go to local animal shelters. 5K, 10K, and full marathon options available.
